articles.description: A new bird-like dinosaur with the partial skeleton of an ancient frog in the remains of its gut has been unearthed in China. According to researchers, the dinosaur named Daurlong wangi, which lived about 120 million years ago, was a type of mid-sized dromaeos…

articles.title: Quantum mechanics makes no sense without the mind | Shan Gao - IAI
articles.description: Since the early days of quantum mechanics, physicists and philosophers argued that resolving the measurement problem requires an appeal to the minds of conscious observers. That is still the case today, argues Shan Gao.
